alcohol.note: The @alcohol variable is true, which means extra passages occur that suggest Ryan has a drinking problem.

furnished.match: a piece or two of abandoned furniture
furnished.note: The Downstairs is full of anonymous abandoned furniture, rather than empty.

empty.match: Some of the rooms seemed like bedrooms

possibles.match: I could feel that old part of me fighting this
possibles.note: The @possible global variable is true, so the “possible” story is included.

dadphone.match: between one blink and the next
dadphone.note: The @dadphone global variable is true, meaning Ryan's trauma is attributed to his father's sudden death.

bradphone.match: my first love had betrayed me
bradphone.note: The @bradphone global variable is true, meaning the source of Ryan's trauma is his toxic relationship with Bradley.

fridgetrapped.note: The @fridgetrapped variable is true. Ryan lost the key.

TheCity.match: out of those houses, those millions of houses
TheCity.note: @TheCity variable is true. The Elder Niko recounts a story of a lower level full of huge houses.

TheBasement.match: they open up into black empty spaces
TheBasement.note: @TheBasement variable is true. The Elder Niko recounts a story of a vast endless basement at the bottom of The Downstairs.

ffdropoff.match: The door opened onto nothing. Past the frame, the floor dropped away into blackness.
ffdropoff.note: The @ffdropoff variable is true. The final fight occurs amidst an endless dropoff into a void.

ffthewalls.match: Perspectives change. Architecture gets stretched to breaking.
ffthewalls.note: The @ffthewalls variable is true. The final fight occurs amidst endless walls stretching into the gloom.

fftubeweird.match: I was at a forty-five-degree angle
fftubeweird.note: The @fftubeweird variable is true. The final fight gets especially weird.

fftube.match: never skydived or bungee jumped before;

ffset.match: I dangled thirty or forty feet below the underside of the bedroom platform
ffset.note: The @ffset variable is true. The final fight takes place amid a giant bedroom set on a platform in a void.

ffchandelier.match: a filigreed structure I couldn't at first identify
ffchandelier.note: The @ffchandelier variable is true. A giant crystal chandelier is a dominant set piece in the final fight.

ffbookshelves.match: I crashed into the mountain of books.
ffbookshelves.note: The @ffbookshelves variable is true. A giant bookshelf is a dominant set piece in the final fight.

cdrom.match: a CD-ROM adventure set on a space station
cdrom.note: The @cdrom variable is true. Ryan plays a weird computer game set on a space station where everyone has gone insane.

gorilla.match: I remembered something from a neurobiology class.
gorilla.note: The @gorilla variable is true. Ryan recalls a famous study in which people do not notice a person in a gorilla suit in a crowd of people.

gayniko.match: I sometimes saw him looking at me, out of the corner of my eye
gayniko.note: The Niko at the end of the novel harbors feelings towards Ryan.

firmniko.match: dropped his arms to his sides. Fixed me with a look
firmniko.note: The Niko at the end of the novel has no feelings toward Ryan.

originalniko.match: I lost my grip on the flashlight, and it tumbled out of my hands, hit the hard shelf underneath me with a crack
